name: King of Dirt: BMX
summary: King of Dirt lets you experience the most immersive first-person bmx action without actually stepping on a real bike. Pull some of the most epic bangers in this adrenaline-fueled arcade extreme sports game. Design the dopest wheels to your liking, get down and dirty on the wild and thrilling dirt trails. Nail tricks like a pro and become the gnarliest legend on the leaderboards. Addition to BMX bikes and Freestyle MTB, you can unlocks Scooters and super sexy Mini-bikes!
